ProductInfo.Features:
This Surveillance Spy Pinhole Video Security Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillace Systems in Various Indoor Environments with High Stability.
Miniature Covert Shape, Aluminum Material, 3.6mm Lens F2.0/90 Degrees View Angle. Power Supply, Input: AC 100V ~ 240V, 50 ~ 60 Hz, Output: DC 5V, 1000mA.
Image Sensor: MC495 1/3" CMOS Image Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TVL. TV System: PAL. Effective Pixels:656(H) x 492(V).
Support Video Output, Video Output: 1.0V p ~ p/75ohm
Internal Synchronization, No Auto Gain Control, No Back Light Compensation, No White Balance Control, 0.45 Y Characteristic.
ProductInfo.Name: BW® 520 TV Lines MC495 1/3 Inch CMOS Image Sensor Mini Covert Color CCTV Surveillance Camera,Spy Security Camera System, 3.6mm F2.0/90 Degrees View Angle Lens, Support Video Output, for Hidden Video Surveillance
